results.content:
Great course!!! This is exactly what I was looking for. It provides the extra knowledge about writing the Angular Apps. Excellent methodology,  Instructor can you share your social media links(youtube, twitter, medium) for following you for next releases!!!

I love the Reactive Programming section!!!!! Excellent examples to understand all concepts(Observables, Operators, Subjects etc...).

results.content:
Being honest I took this course to update my knowledge of Angular but immediately I could realize that besides Angular, the author offers is a very solid architecture content.
Workspaces and Monorepo is something I wish I had known before.
I'm have not finished the course yet and I think the return on investment is already paying off.

response.content: Hi Raul, I really appreciate your early review. It means a lot! Getting paid for something that you love doing is great but knowing that your students enjoy the content and learn from it is just incredible! Thank you for your support.
